New Records: England's openers Jos Buttler and Alex Hales added 170 together, the highest partnership in T20 World Cups.

Chris Woakes removed KL Rahul early in the innings.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli struggled against England's bowling.
India hit 68 off the last 30 balls to reach 168/6.
England's openers reached 52 for 0 in 5 overs, taking advantage of field restrictions.
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma mentioned he would have batted first if he had won the toss.
England opted to bowl first despite their poor recent record chasing.
England brought in Phil Salt and Chris Jordan for Dawid Malan and Mark Wood.
India picked Rishabh Pant ahead of Dinesh Karthik.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma reflected on India's familiar struggles with early wickets and slow starts.
